transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ya, good morning, ma'am.
Customer: Ha, good morning, sir.
Executive: Main Tejas baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office mein Delhi se.
Customer: Ya, sir.
Executive: Meri ma'am Rakshita ma'am se baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Ya, sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Ma'am aapne call kiya tha ek concern ke regarding IndiaMART ke support se, to aapko like kya cheezein jaanni hai, pehle aap mujhe bataiye, fir main aapko completely pura guide karta hun saari cheezein.
Customer: Yes sir, I need training, okay.
Executive: Okay. Training for the complete IndiaMART na?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Okay. So how to take the leads, how to like, like take a customer. I don't know anything about it, okay. Just like 10 days before I joined. Just then I learned. Ma'am said to learn IndiaMART also. So I requested to you train.
Executive: Okay, okay. So I am the only assigned person. So like you have to save my number. My good name is Tejas, okay. Uh, so you have like your PC login, like your account login for now. So like I will definitely connect with you on your Google Meet. So I will definitely guide you. Okay, so is this like you have the primary email also? Uh, like
Customer: Yes, yes.
Executive: Okay, I can like share you the Google Meet link, so like you can join.
Customer: Yes, sir. I should send uh, what's up.
Executive: Be on the line and yeah, do check your primary email ID, ma'am. Uh, you have received uh, like uh, any kind of Google Meet link or not? Or let me know.
Customer: No, sir, nothing.
Customer: I didn't receive, sir.
Executive: So didn't receive, na?
Customer: No, sir.
Executive: I am, is this your same WhatsApp number, na?
Customer: Yes, sir. Same I have received from WhatsApp. You have sent some IndianMART good morning message.
Executive: So I am sharing uh, like I already shared a like good morning message on your WhatsApp number.
Customer: Okay. Okay. Yeah. Share, share your email ID like through which you want to join and you can join the meeting from the Google like WhatsApp. But just let me know the exact email ID like you are using to login in meeting. So I have to mention uh, in the company.
Customer: Yes, sir. Yes, sir. Just two minutes, I will send it.
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: There are many email IDs, so I am searching, okay.
Executive: Hmm hmm, there is no issue, I am on the line.

Customer: Yes, sir. Yes, sir.
Executive: So like you have sent, like you uh, you are using this uh, email na, to join the meeting?
Customer: Yes, this is my email ID of company.
Executive: Okay, of your company. Theek hai, right.
Executive: Okay, so do click on the link and join the meeting.
Customer: Ah, okay, sir.
Executive: Ma'am, you are comfortable like in complete English or like you are comfortable in like English like aadhi Hindi, aadhi English?
Customer: Hindi I can understand but I can't speak. I am comfortable speaking English.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. There is no issue. I will definitely guide you.
Executive: Okay, so you have to do one thing, ma'am. Like you have to share your screen. So like uh
Customer: Screen, okay, sir. I will call by my company phone because in system screen is not available, right?
Executive: Okay. Let me ask, let me ask one more question. Like uh, you are login from the PC or like you are using your mobile phone to join the meeting for now?
Customer: No, in the system I have to login, I have to attend means there is no screen available, right?
Executive: Okay. Ha, yeah, okay.
Customer: Screen is not there.
Executive: Okay, so like, like you are, well you have logged in on your PC, na? You are like you are using your system, na, for the access panel? Like IndiaMART account. Okay.
Customer: Yes, sir.
Executive: Like okay, and uh, like you are the account manager of your company or like you are the only one who manages the overall complete business, like
Customer: Yes, sir, I am the one girl is there, she is resigning after one month. After that I should only manage all the things, so they are giving training to me.
Executive: Okay, so who is Shevant uh, that train, you know Shevant?
Customer: Don't know, sir.
Executive: Okay, so like uh, do you call like on the 9696 number, na, of your IndiaMART uh, call center?
Customer: Yes, sir.
Executive: Okay, so like uh, you will be assigned a person who like uh, takes your complete information and uh, let you know ki like uh, like they are arranging a uh, call with our account manager, right?
Customer: Yes, sir.
Executive: Okay. So uh, you have to like uh, I the number I have saved you on your WhatsApp, na? You have to save that number like 80777. So like in future whenever like you need any kind of assistance regarding your IndiaMART account or like uh, like the timing, the up the like renewal timing is also coming in the last like like in upcoming weeks. So like we have to uh, renew our services too. But there is no issue. Uh, like uh, I am cutting this call and uh, like uh, we will join on a meeting.
Customer: Yes, sir, we will join.
Executive: Sure, sure, sure, sure. Okay, ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs training on how to take leads.

Resolution:

- Executive shared Google Meet link on WhatsApp.

- Executive will guide on Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, google meet, leads, account
